inclusion.criterion: No fetal anomalies according to Fetal Anomaly Screening Programme definition
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to read English (as the survey instruments are only available in English)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing maternal cardiovascular or respiratory disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to lying prone (severe pain etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to self-adhesive electrodes used for standard electrocardiography (ECG)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but symptoms improved with treatment. She is still overweight.
